wikipedia_page.main: Julia Gregson (born 1947) is a British  writer of short stories and novels. Her first published short  story won Ryman's Literary Review Short story award. In 2009, her novel East of the Sun  won the Prince Maurice Prize for Literary Love stories, and the Romantic Novel of the Year Award by the Romantic Novelists' Association.
